items.name: Damnation Wish
explicitMods: +1 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 32 to 48 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
4 to 5 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that aren't triggered.
explicitMods:
Gain 1 Momentum when you Use a Supported Skill
Gain 1 Momentum every 0.51 seconds while Channelling a Supported Skill
Lose all Momentum if you Move
Supported Skills have 20% increased Attack Speed per Momentum

When you reach 5 Momentum, lose all Momentum and gain
Swiftness for 2.0 seconds
Swiftness grants 15% increased Movement Speed per Momentum lost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 54% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Eternal Struggle
implicitMods: While a Pinnacle Atlas Boss is in your Presence, 50% increased Critical Strike Chance for Attacks
explicitMods: Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant
flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Supported Skills have 10% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% increased Mine Throwing Speed per Frenzy Charge

Supported Skills have 25% increased Critical Strike Chance per
Power Charge when used by Mines

30% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when a Mine from Supported
Skills is Detonated targeting an Enemy

30% chance to gain a Power Charge when a Mine from Supported
Skills is Detonated targeting an Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage to a single enemy, dealing more damage if they are Hexed, then removing the Hex. If the enemy was Hexed, also deals area damage to other enemies around the target, boosting damage and removing Hexes from those enemies in the same way.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Time is added to its Cooldown if Triggered
All Damage can Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Chaos Damage with Hits is Resisted by lowest Resistance instead
40% more Damage with Ailments if Enemy is Hexed

100% more Damage with Hits if Enemy is Hexed
Removes a Hex after Damaging
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% increased Mine Throwing Speed

Supported Skills have 46% less Mine Throwing Speed

20% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
explicitMods: 0.29% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
45% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that are not triggered. Instead of casting that spell, you will summon a totem that casts the spell for you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills will summon a Totem which uses that Skill

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a debilitating debuff on enemies in an area, hindering their movement and also inflicts the Withered debuff, which increases the Chaos Damage they take and can stack up to 15 times.

items.name: Foe Coil
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit

items.name: Profane Proxy
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

explicitMods: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
12% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

items.name: Onslaught Needle
implicitMods: Adds 5 to 10 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 33 Lightning Damage to Spells

You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 42 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 661 total Damage from Hits
